comment.author: 46578719@N07
comment._content: Thank you! San Diego Air and SPace Museum! Chinese Americans were and are a part of the greatest generation. Photographic evident such as this is so important!

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/ranger_yee] Thank you. In addition, we just put up an Asian Americans in Aviation Online Exhibit: www.sandiegoairandspace.org/exhibits/asian_american_exhibit/
